Name: Hardcore ZBoy
About the game: There is no plot in the game. You play as a zombie that runs from people, you have to run as far as possible. In the game you need to hold out until the next day and score 700 points. Features: -The twisted music written by Russian composers. (Graffeets Prod.) -Unreal dynamics -Unreal speed -Unreal complexity -Excellent graphics
